definition: to refute/to demolish (an argument, theory etc)
variegated/heterogeneous/to refute/to contradict/to ship by barge/a barge/a lighter (ship)
to place upside down/to invert/to pour/to throw out/to move backwards/however/actually/as a matter of fact/contrary to expectation
to fall/to collapse/to lie horizontally/to overthrow/to fail/to go bankrupt/to change (trains or buses)/to move around/to resell at a profit

sentences.english: This congressman is clever at making scores off hecklers at public meetings.
sentences.chinese: 这位国会议员擅长在公众集会上驳倒诘难者。

sentences.english: The lawyer confuted the testimony of the witness by showing actual photographs of the accident.
sentences.chinese: 律师出示那次事故的真实照片，驳倒了证人的证言。

sentences.english: I may be able to score him off.
It is quite difficult for skeptics to refute the existence of ghosts simply because of ghosts' nature.
sentences.chinese: 因鬼魂的特性所致，质疑者很难驳倒鬼魂存在论。

sentences.english: He bowled down his opponent in the debate.
sentences.chinese: 他在辩论中彻底驳倒了对方。

sentences.english: He had little difficulty in talking the slanderer down.
sentences.chinese: 他以事实和数字为后盾毫不费力地驳倒了诽谤者。

sentences.english: The evidence demolished the attorney's case.
sentences.chinese: 那证据驳倒了律师提出的理由。

sentences.english: He bested her in the argument.
Therefore there is an external world and sceptism is refuted.
sentences.chinese: 因此外在世界的存在驳倒了怀疑论。

sentences.english: He has a glib tongue. Few people can argue him down.
sentences.chinese: 他有三寸不烂之舌，几乎没人能驳倒他。

sentences.english: I retorted, showing a decided purple witness to refute her.
sentences.chinese: 我回嘴，指着我明摆着的紫斑作为见证来驳倒她。

sentences.english: He was unable to confute the debater.
sentences.chinese: 他未能驳倒对方的辩论者。

sentences.english: The census disproves these claims completely.
sentences.chinese: 但是，这份调查彻底驳倒了他的言论。

sentences.english: The best antiquaries have now confuted Homer.
sentences.chinese: 最好的考古学者已经将荷马驳倒了。

sentences.english: He had no difficulty in ague his teacher down.
sentences.chinese: 他毫无困难地驳倒了老师。

sentences.english: She disposed of the arguments against her plan in two sentences .
sentences.chinese: 她用三言两语就驳倒了反对她的计划的论点。

definition: to make a story or theory consistent/to give a plausible explanation/to plug the holes in one's story
reductio ad absurdum/arguing by contradiction/also called 反證法|反证法
lit. to quote the classics/to quote chapter and verse (idiom)
